name: Momentum Breakout Strategy
description: Identify stocks breaking above resistance with strong volume. Enter on pullback with tight stops.

name: Swing Trading Setup
description: Trade multi-day moves using daily charts. Look for trend continuation patterns with good risk/reward.

name: Scalping M5 Setup
description: Quick trades on 5-minute timeframe. Focus on high liquidity pairs with tight spreads.

name: Reversal Pattern Trading
description: Trade reversals at key support/resistance levels using candlestick patterns for confirmation.
